text: Ia an amamangatɨghtɨ a mongamin nguibar ekiam ategh mangɨgham, ian arazir kamɨn, ia nguazir kam damightɨ a nan damazimɨn mɨzegham. Gumazibav sozi me ariaghirir arazir kam, nguazim gamima, a nan damazimɨn mɨze. Nguazim damightɨ a zueghamin arazim, tuavir vamɨra iti, a kamakɨn, ia gumazir a mɨsoghezɨ an aremezimɨn arazir kuram ikaragh a mɨsueghtɨ an aremegh. Tuavir igharazitam, ua itir puvatɨ.
